5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Abdullah bin Abu Awfa that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prayed two Rak’ah on the day when he was given the glad tidings of the head (death) of Abu Jahl

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ وَالسَّجْدَةِ عِنْدَ الشُّكْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning Prayer and prostration at times of gratitude
